title: [CZM]命令方块改良版1.7+造墙机
author: czmknmsl
txt_content:
大家好，我是CZM
原帖地址在这里

然而他是将方块一个一个搭起来。。。
于是，本人做出了这个改良版

————————————————分割线————————————————
指令：
summon FallingSand ~ ~ ~ {Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:42,Time:1,Motion:[0.0,0.0,10.0]}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码看起来挺吓人。。。但是实际上很简单。。。
就是利用Riding堆叠一大堆铁块（这里是40个）
NBT在此我不详细讲了
至于最后的Motion:[0.0,0.0,10.0]，10.0会使方块柱子达到瞬移般的速度，但貌似上限就是10.0，再高刷不出来
做成这样的原因是让他尽可能贴近地平线发射，以免产生上漂（仔细看第一张图，右边比左边高）


于是乎，影响墙的大小的因素就只有刷出的Y轴高度了
如果把第一排的~ ~ ~ 改成 ~ ~1 ~甚至更高，那就会发射得更远
当然你也可以放一个泥土柱子来限制发射距离
————————————————分割线————————————————
鉴于本帖是新手伸手党向而非大触向，特在此提供指令生成器
